rules.description: Arc: COMMAND+U to undo close tab
Arc: COMMAND+` to switch to last used tab
Arc: COMMAND+O to open a new tab
Slack: COMMAND+N to jump to next channel
Slack: COMMAND+P to jump to previous channel
Slack: CONTROL+F to scroll to next day
Slack: CONTROL+B to scroll to previous day
Slack: COMMAND+R to add a reaction
Slack: COMMAND+E to edit last message
Slack: COMMAND+U to go to Unreads
Slack: COMMAND+T to go to Threads
Slack: COMMAND+W to close thread view
Slack: COMMAND+O to open thread view
Map COMMAND+M to vk_none
Open Arc with COMMAND+1
Open Kitty with COMMAND+2
Open Slack with COMMAND+3
Open Notes with COMMAND+4
Open Maccy with COMMAND+CONTROL+M
Map CAPSLOCK to CONTROL on hold, and to ESCAPE on tap
Map RETURN to CONTROL on hold
Map COMMAND+H/J/K/L to arrow LEFT/DOWN/UP/RIGHT
Map CONTROL+H/J/K/L to HOME/PAGE_DOWN/PAGE_UP/END
Map OPTION+H/J/K/L to OPTION+LEFT/DOWN/UP/RIGHT
Map CONTROL+N/P to DOWN/UP
Map CONTROL+[ to ESCAPE everywhere except terminal apps
Map COMMAND+BACKSPACE to OPTION+BACKSPACE
Map COMMAND+DELETE to OPTION+DELETE
Swap ; and :
Safari - Open new tab at the end
Map OPTION+DELETE to OPTION+D (ALT+D)
Start screen saver on pressing ESCAPE key
Map COMMAND+BACKTICK to OPTION+SHIFT+BACKTICK
Map F5 to only COMMAND+SHIFT+SPACE when in Slack
Map F5 to both COMMAND+SHIFT+SPACE (Slack) and COMMAND+SHIFT+A (Zoom) (remember to enable global shortcut for `Mute/Unmute My Audio` in Zoom's Settings)
